package.name: cartsguru
package.summary: The first targeted and automated follow-up solution for abandoned carts through phone and text message !
package.description:
There is a way to transform those abandoned shopping carts into sales !
Carts Guru enable you to establish automatic contact with your prospective customers who did not finalize their purchase.
Targets your abandoned shopping carts, define your rules and run actions automatically thought phone and SMS
- Automatic call Effortlessly reduce the number of abandoned shopping carts by automating telephone contact between your salespeople and the customers who have just left your site
- SMS Callback & Push SMS Send to your prospective customers having abandoned a cart, an SMS suggesting a free call back from your customer relations service, a straightforward SMS reminder or an SMS offering a personalized discount
package.notes: - Add recovery cart link - Fix send gender in some cases
